title: Cassoulet with Duck and Extra Veg

ingredients.content: 1 leek, white part only, sliced 2 cm (approx. 150 g)
¾ tsp fine sea salt, plus extra to taste
⅓ tsp ground black pepper, plus extra to taste
480 g tinned cannellini beans (2 x 400 g tins, drained)

preparations.content: Heat 2 Tbsp olive oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat then brown the duck breasts all over for approximately 5 minutes. Remove duck breasts and set aside.
Place 2 Tbsp olive oil and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add leek, carrots, celery, courgette, salt and pepper then cook <b>5 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add tomatoes, reserved browned duck breasts, parsley, thyme and bay leaves then heat <b>3 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add beans, stock cube and water (no higher than maximum mark in mixing bowl) then, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>25 min/98°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Remove duck breasts with tongs and slice thinly. Return meat to mixing bowl and stir with spatula.
Adjust seasoning to taste before serving.

hintsAndTricks: A filling dish for after a run with protein from the duck and beans but without too many calories.
